ISSUE.TITLE: Display error on accessing disabled shared base link
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Node: **v16.14.0** Arch: **arm64** Platform: **darwin** Docker: **false** Database: **mysql2** ProjectOnRootDB: **false** RootDB: **mysql2** PackageVersion: **0.96.4** - Share base - Copy URL - Disable `share base` - Access copied URL: page keeps loading. Throw error instead (like its done for shared view case) : `Invalid URL`

COMMIT.MESSAGE: enhancement(gui): add not found page for handling invalid base url re #3648 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
